1.name: kiet the dev
1.text: every game need a model am i right ?

2.name: kiet the dev
2.text: was it disapointing to play this 50 times just to unlock new pixel tho ?

3.name: player
3.text: why am i skate boarding instead of a proper running animation ?

4.name: kiet the dev
4.text: well pixel animation is hard and riding something is less drawing intensive
